Journal.Title: The Journal of clinical and aesthetic dermatology

Article.ArticleTitle: Perioral Dermatitis Caused by Improper Use of Activated Oxygen in CPAP users and its Complexity.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Dr. Ahmed is with the Department of Dermatology, Venereology and Leprosy, and All India Institute of Medical Sciences in Raipur, India.
Dr. Pal is with the Symbiosis Institute of Health Sciences, Symbiosis International University, Pune Intensive Care Unit, Bharati Vidyapeeth Hospital and Research Center in Pune, India.
Dr. Esquinas is with the Intensive Care Unit at Hospital Morales Meseguer in Murcia, Spain.
Dr. Karim is with the Department of Anesthesiology, Critical Care and Pain Medicine at All India Institute of Medical Sciences in Raipur, India.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: DISCLOSURES.: The authors report no conflicts of interest relevant to the content of this article.
